verses.roman:
nando gopās' ca gopyaś ca
govinda-caraṇāmbuje
manaḥ kṣiptaṁ punar hartum
anīśā mathurāṁ yayuḥ

synonyms: nandaḥ—Nanda; gopāḥ—the cowherd men; ca—and; gopyaḥ—the cowherd women; ca—also; govinda—of Kṛṣṇa; caraṇa-ambuje—at the lotus feet; manaḥ—their minds; kṣiptam—cast; punaḥ—again; hartum—to remove; anīśāḥ—incapable; mathurām—to Mathurā; yayuḥ—they went.
translation: Unable to withdraw their minds from Lord Govinda's lotus feet, where they had surrendered them, Nanda and the cowherd men and women returned to Mathurā.
